articles.title: Game Boy classic Donkey Kong Land is on Nintendo Switch Online now - Polygon
articles.description: Nintendo Switch Online’s retro catalogue now includes another classic: Donkey Kong Land, the Game Boy adaptation of the SNES game Donkey Kong Country.
articles.content: Joining the likes of Metroid 2, Kirbys Dream Land, Links Awakening, and tons of other amazing Game Boy games, Nintendo Switch Onlines retro catalogue now includes another classic: Donkey Kong Land. I… [+1122 chars]

articles.title: Play the awesome new Call of Duty campaign while it’s $1 - Polygon
articles.description: The best Call of Duty game campaign in over a decade is on Game Pass. If you have an Xbox or PC, you need to play it.
articles.content:
I didnt expect to say either of these things to you when 2024 began: the new Call of Duty single-player campaign is a blast. And you can play it for $1.
